name: There is a frog to save the earth OLC 2019
name_original: There is a frog to save the earth OLC 2019
description:
Hello there 

src: https://github.com/raoul632/frogfrog-olc-2019 

I'm really happy to participate to this jam, its hard to fit to the theme 
i had two option start a new project, or finish what i'm doing.
i decide to finish the game i'm doing and to fit this game to the theme (maybie i fail but it was pretty fun)

i program this one from scratch and only with the idea i've,with  sfml and c++.. thats why i had forget the turtles :-) 
 .. use my own skill 

to play just use arrow key and avoid car or truck. 

here 0 good practice was used to made this :-) but after played a lot at shenzhen i/o when i've ask to javidx
but how a part of this program can communicate with another part of it and just with this simple answer (thourgh pointer) i realize 
something ... 

there is a ram inside this computer, a big bunch of ram .. i can use short term memory and long term memory 
and after this realisation all became easy .. really easy 

i know its not the game of the century there is plenty of frogger but i took so many fun to do it .. 
its up to you if the theme destruction was respected . ..

all the assets a free to use 

music : 

assets: 
http://www.classicgaming.cc/classics/frogger/graphics
fonts: 
https://www.1001fonts.com/retro+video-game-fonts.html?page=3&items=10
gomari

hope you enjoy the few minute of this game, if you are a person who know how 
to draw some sprite, don't hesitate to send me a message at one lone coder discord .. or here
